column5: Drove by Little lake in Barrie this morning and there was a skim of ice on some parts of the lake. Guess it won't be too long before we will be out on those lakes. Gettin the itch!!!  Rob C
do you think there is enoughice for my atv  dang, I m going fishing where did I put that portable hut
ice...keep it the hell away from me.  You guys can fish on the ice, ill play pond hockey.  ice fishing is not for me

I had a tad of ice here this morning on a couple of ponds.  Looks like it's going to warm up a little in the next few days though.  I'd give it another 2 months before it's safe to venture out.  Be safe on the hardwater this season.
There is a couple inches on some lakes up here in northwestern ontario, but with a recent warm trend, not much will be happening for a bit.
I am with Glen - as my avitar says - " bring on the ice! "   Don
Yup..bring on the ice baby!I love seeing the reports and the frozen boys catchin! Joe
it is time...I got one more musky hunt left in me and then its time to fire up the old auger (and the barbie sled)
Where's your avatar Rizzo???? or is it going to be brought out when the ice finally does form???
I'm very puter illiterate, gotta work on the avatar thingee, all my photos are still hosted at the old site, not sure if I can get it from there, guess now is a good time to try
here here! bring on the ice! (but if it takes a little while to arrive, theres lotsa open water opportunities nearby for me!)
well, it took a few minutes, but barbie is back...man there are a lot of options on this new site.  Kind of intimidating for us 2 finger typers but I got it figured out
LA LA LA LA LA LA I cant hear you......
but it's gonna be 9 or 10 degrees this weekend, that'll take care of any ice. Wait till this time next month though
